ModMetaData.name: Children Learn on Caravan
ModMetaData.author: Heather Athebyne
ModMetaData.description:
That constellation is called the Muffalo...
Here's how you can find bushes with lots of berries...
Race you to that big rock!
Caravanning can be way more than an endless "are we there yet?". This mod gradually fills children's learning need while on caravan. Be sure to give them a [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2972704114]thrumbo plushie[/url] too! (Not actually required, but why not?)
Image by josealbafotos via Pixabay.
